quick_start_steps.command: cd supabase && cp .env.example .env && # Edit `.env` — set `POSTGRES_PASSWORD`, `JWT_SECRET`, and IDP credentials && docker compose up -d
cd godot && dotnet build && # Open in Godot Editor, or run directly: /path/to/Godot --path .

architecture.details: Self-hosted for accounts, friends, and presence

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Google, Facebook, Discord, Twitch OAuth + Guest (device ID)

features.name: Bot Replacement
features.description: Disconnected players auto-replaced by bot after 1 missed turn

testing_multiplayer.description: For testing multiplayer, you can run the server and multiple clients headlessly or with GUIs
testing_multiplayer.command:
# Headless server + 3 GUI clients
mkdir -p logs && /path/to/Godot --headless --path godot -- --server --test-mode > logs/server.log 2>&1 &
/path/to/Godot --path godot -- --no-server &
